user_message: I feel overwhelmed and frozen. I can't move right now.
My chest feels tight and everything feels like too much.
I'm panicking and my thoughts are racing.
I feel disconnected from my body and the moment.
I'm feeling really sad today and don't know why.
I've been emotionally drained all week.
I just need someone to listen for a bit.
I feel lonely even when I'm around people.
I want to prepare what to talk about in my therapy session.
Can you help me organize my thoughts before therapy tomorrow?
I’m not sure how to explain what I’ve been feeling to my therapist.
I don't feel safe right now.
I'm scared I might hurt myself.
Everything feels wrong and I don't know what to do.
I feel numb and overwhelmed at the same time.
